@StephhasADHD @RepPressley See info in this petition. You aren't alone... https://t.co/jz9EleIolC

#MEICPRIMER offers medical guidance that includes info helpful for #Longcovid even if they aren't the same.

@RepPressley One tool that @HHS could implement today to help #LongCovid is agree to what thousands have been asking for. Proper recognition of #MyalgicE so Drs know how to screen all of these patient groups using #MEICPrimer 

Petition Â· #PwME4ICC https://t.co/jz9EleIolC

@StephhasADHD @RepPressley I hear you. No one can be prepared for the effect on our lives chronic debilitating biological illness can cause.  #pwME know this all to well. Thorough screening is key & what many of us have fought for. #MyalgicEncephalomyelitis

@RepPressley Please, as my representative, I beg you to learn and incorporate the readily available data showing #LongCovid is NOT NEW! #MECFS is essentially long Covid for life & 46% of LC patients meet its criteria after 6mo. Post-viral illness started long before LC and no one cares.

@RepPressley Please include Myalgic Encephalomyelitis/Chronic Fatigue Syndrome and Dysautonomia. Both extremely underfunded. Both showing up in Long Covid. Understanding and treating these disorders will help current sufferers and prevent future post viral disability.
@RepPressley Thank you! Two years and counting for me.
